description:
Right before the 3 hour mark, [b]heavy rain started pouring[/b] at the Mulsanne area, causing carnage through the field and [b]causing a Safety Car that lasted 85 minutes[/b] due to barrier reparations.
Alive in the wet, [b]the #94 Peugeot led after resuming but was quickly passed[/b] in now dry conditions. [b]Bad timing for the Toyotas had lost them time in the pits[/b]. [b]Penalties for the #3 Cadillac and the #5 Porsche, and a slow puncture for the #6 Porsche[/b] also lost them ground with the leaders.
Before the 5 hour mark, in a colder and damper track, [b]an out-of-sync #38 Jota crashed at the end of the lap while leading[/b], sustaining heavy damage in the back.
5 hours and a half passed, all cars in the lead lap were more or less in sync again.
